if exists (select * from enter_list where enter_code='@@ENTER_CODE,' and enter_sts='0') begin insert into product_account(order_code,product_code,enter_num,oper_date,oper_demo,init_num,add_num,minus_num,store_num) select enter_code,product_code,product_num,getdate(),'条码入库',dbo.getProductStore1(product_code),product_num,0,dbo.getProductStore1(product_code)+product_num from enter_product where enter_code='@@ENTER_CODE,' update product_list set product_list.product_num=product_list.product_num+enter_product.product_num from product_list inner join enter_product on product_list.product_code = enter_product.product_code and enter_product.enter_code = '@@ENTER_CODE,' update enter_list set enter_sts='3',enter_type='5' where enter_code='@@ENTER_CODE,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists (select * from pack_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and box_code='@@BOX_CODE,' and product_txm='@@PRODUCT_TXM,' ) INSERT INTO PACK_LIST( ORDER_CODE, BOX_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PACK_NUM, PRODUCT_UNTL,PRODUCT_TXM,BOX_STS,PRODUCT_NUM,AppadId) select '@@ORDER_CODE,', '@@BOX_CODE,',a.product_code,a.product_name,1,a.product_untl,a.product_txm,'0',b.fact_num,b.ID from product_list a,order_product_list b where a.product_code = b.product_code and product_txm='@@PRODUCT_TXM,' and order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' else update PACK_LIST set pack_num=pack_num+1 where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and box_code='@@BOX_CODE,' and product_txm='@@PRODUCT_TXM,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin update PACK_LIST set box_sts='0' where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and BOX_CODE='@@BOX_CODE,' update order_product_list set out_num =0 where order_code = '@@ORDER_CODE,' and product_code in (select product_code from pack_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,') end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists (select * from pack_list where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and appadId='@@AppadId,' and box_code=' ') INSERT INTO PACK_LIST( ORDER_CODE, BOX_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PACK_NUM, PRODUCT_UNTL,PRODUCT_TXM,APPadID,PRODUCT_NUM,PRODUCT_COLOR) select '@@ORDER_CODE,', ' ',product_code,product_name,'@@PACK_NUM,',product_untl,'','@@AppadId,',fact_num,Product_Color from order_product_list where id='@@AppadId,' else update PACK_LIST set pack_num=convert(int,'@@PACK_NUM,') where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and appadId='@@AppadId,' and box_code=' '
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin update PACK_LIST set BOX_CODE='@@BOX_CODE,' where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' and BOX_CODE=' ' update order_product_list set out_num =out_num+pack_list.pack_num from order_product_list inner join pack_list on order_product_list.id = pack_list.appadid and pack_list.order_code = '@@ORDER_CODE,' and pack_list.box_code='@@BOX_CODE,' end
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from PACK_LIST where PACK_ID='@@PACK_ID,' update order_product_list set out_num =out_num-pack_list.pack_num from order_product_list inner join pack_list on order_product_list.id = pack_list.appadid and pack_list.pack_id = '@@PACK_ID,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: begin update order_product_list set order_code = '@@Order_Code,',Demo = Demo+'并@@ORDER_CODE,' where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' update order_list set order_sts='10' where order_code='@@ORDER_CODE,' end

row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from enter_list where Enter_Code='@@ENTER_CODE,' delete from enter_product where Enter_Code = '@@ENTER_CODE,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from enter_product where enter_man = '@@LS.YHDM,' and enter_code = ' ' and product_code='@@ProductCode,' ) INSERT INTO ENTER_PRODUCT(PRODUCT_CODE, ENTER_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NUM, PRODUCT_UTIL, PRODUCT_COLOR, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,ENTER_MAN,Ware_code,enter_date) SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE,' ',a.PRODUCT_NAME,'@@ProductNum,',a.PRODUCT_Untl,a.PRODUCT_COLOR,a.SERIES_CODE, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,'@@LS.YHDM,',ware_code,getdate() FROM product_list a WHERE a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@ProductCode,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from A_Store_Detail where Store_code = '@@LS.DWDM,' and product_code='@@ProductCode,' ) INSERT INTO A_Store_Detail(PRODUCT_CODE, Store_Code, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NUM,Product_Price, PRODUCT_COLOR, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,Agent_code,Product_Amount) SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE,'@@LS.DWDM,',a.PRODUCT_NAME,'@@ProductNum,','@@ProductPrice,',a.PRODUCT_COLOR,a.SERIES_CODE, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,'@@LS.DWDM,',convert(int,'@@ProductNum,')*convert(decimal(8,2),'@@ProductPrice,') FROM product_list a WHERE a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@ProductCode,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from A_Order_Detail where Order_code = '@@Order_Code,' and product_code='@@Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO A_Order_Detail(PRODUCT_CODE, Order_Code, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NUM,Product_Price, PRODUCT_COLOR, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,Shop_code,Product_Amount,Price_Type) SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Order_Code,',a.PRODUCT_NAME,'@@Product_Num,',Sale_Price,a.PRODUCT_COLOR,a.SERIES_CODE, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,'@@Agent_Code,',convert(int,'@@Product_Num,')*Sale_Price,Price_Type FROM a_stock a WHERE a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@Product_Code,' and a.agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from A_Return_Detail where Return_code = '@@Return_Code,' and product_code='@@ProductCode,' ) INSERT INTO A_Return_Detail(PRODUCT_CODE, Return_Code, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NUM,Product_Price, PRODUCT_COLOR, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,Product_Amount,Return_Memo) SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Return_Code,',a.PRODUCT_NAME,'@@ProductNum,','@@ProductPrice,',a.PRODUCT_COLOR,a.SERIES_CODE, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,convert(int,'@@ProductNum,')*convert(decimal(8,2),'@@ProductPrice,'),'@@Return_Memo,' FROM product_list a WHERE a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@ProductCode,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update A_Return_Detail set product_num='@@ProductNum,',Product_Price='@@ProductPrice,',Product_Amount=convert(int,'@@ProductNum,')*convert(decimal(8,2),'@@ProductPrice,'),Return_Memo='@@Order_Memo,' where Return_Id='@@ID,'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into order_list(order_code,order_date,order_man,agent_code,out_date,prodcut_num,order_amount,fact_num,fact_amount,order_sts,demo) values('@@Order_Code,',getdate(),'@@LS.YHDM,','@@Agent_Code,','@@Out_Date,','@@Order_Num,','@@Order_Amount,','0','0.00','0','@@Demo,')

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from order_product_list where Order_code = '@@Order_Code,' and product_code='@@Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO order_product_list( PRODUCT_CODE, ORDER_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_NUM,ORDER_NUM,ORDER_AMOUNT,SHOP_MAN,SELECT_TIME,PRICE_KIND,PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,PRICE_TYPE,WARE_CODE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Product_Txm) SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Order_Code, ',a.PRODUCT_NAME,a.SERIES_CODE, a.PRODUCT_SIZE,a.PRODUCT_Untl,dbo.getOrderPriceByAgent('@@Agent_Code,',Product_Code) PRODUCT_PRICE1,a.PRODUCT_NUM-isNull(a.ABS_NUM,0) PRODUCT_NUM,'@@Product_Num,' ORDER_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*dbo.getOrderPriceByAgent('@@Agent_Code,',Product_Code) AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,',getdate(),'0',PACK_NUM,PACK_TYPE,PRICE_TYPE,WARE_CODE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Product_Txm FROM product_list a WHERE a.PRODUCT_CODE='@@Product_Code,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update order_product_list set order_num='@@d_Order_Num,',order_amount=convert(int,'@@d_Order_Num,')*product_price,Demo='@@d_Product_Memo,' where id='@@d_Product_Id,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: update order_product_list set fact_num='@@d_Order_Num,',fact_amount=convert(int,'@@d_Order_Num,')*product_price,Demo='@@d_Product_Memo,' where id='@@d_Product_Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists( select * from pack_list where box_code='@@Box_Code,' and product_txm='@@Product_Txm,') insert into pack_list(order_code,box_code,product_code,product_name,pack_num,product_txm,appadid,product_num,box_sts) select '@@Order_Code,','@@Box_Code,',product_code,product_name,1,product_txm,id,fact_num-out_num,'0' from order_product_list where product_txm='@@Product_Txm,' and order_code='@@Order_Code,' else update pack_list set pack_num=pack_num+1 where box_code='@@Box_Code,' and product_txm='@@Product_Txm,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: if not exists( select * from pack_list where box_code='@@Box_Code,' and appadId='@@AppadId,') insert into pack_list(order_code,box_code,product_code,product_name,pack_num,product_txm,appadid,product_num,box_sts) select '@@Order_Code,','@@Box_Code,',product_code,product_name,'@@Product_Num,',product_txm,id,fact_num,'0' from order_product_list where id='@@AppadId,' else update pack_list set pack_num='@@Product_Num,' where box_code='@@Box_Code,' and appadId='@@AppadId,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: update order_product_list set out_num =out_num-pack_list.pack_num from order_product_list inner join pack_list on order_product_list.id = pack_list.appadid and pack_list.box_code='@@Box_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: iNSERT INTO backdetails(PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,disaccount_price,product_id,zk,back_reason,ware_code,fact_num,fact_amount,pxh,pack_memo,pack_num,pack_nums,type_agent,type_ls,store_num,product_mj,store_no,pcs_dj,product_attr,product_image) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,order_price*dbo.getOrderZK('@@QYZK,',series_code)/100 PRODUCT_PRICE,0 AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,',back_type,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,order_price*dbo.getOrderZK('@@QYZK,',series_code)/100 PRODUCT_PRICE,id,dbo.getOrderZK('@@QYZK,',series_code), back_type memo,'@@BFDH,','@@Product_Num,' Fact_NUM,0 Fact_AMOUNT,(select case '@@d_PXH,' when '' then isnull(max(pxh)+10,0) else @@d_PXH,-1 end from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,') pxh,convert(varchar,pack_num)+product_untl+'/'+pack_type pack_memo,pack_num,0 pack_nums,type_agent,product_price,0,product_mj,store_no,pcs_dj,product_attr,product_image FROM product_list a,dbo.v_orderPrice('@@Agent_Code,','@@Product_Code,') WHERE id='@@Product_Code,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update backDetails set fact_num='@@d_Order_Num,',back_num='@@d_Order_Num,',fact_amount='@@d_Order_Amount,',back_amount='@@d_Order_Amount,',product_price='@@d_Product_Price,',back_reason='@@d_Product_Memo,',complete_date='@@d_CompleteDate,' where id='@@d_Product_Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into backlist(Back_Code,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Back_Date,Arr_Date,Back_Sts,Back_Demo,Note_Type,Opr_Man,Opr_Dw,JSDH,Back_Type,YWY,Arr_Man,Arr_Tel,Arr_Address,Dis_Amount,Dised_Amount,Tis_Amount,Account_Amount,Taf_Amount,Brand_Code,gg_amount,cx_amount,tj_amount,cd_amount,qt_amount,qyzk,djlx,arr_fax,lgjy,pro_amount,wl_amount,isupdate) values('@@Back_Code,','@@Agent_Code,','@@Order_Num,',getdate(),'@@Arr_Date,','0','@@Demo,','@@Note_Type,','@@LS.XM,','@@LS.DWDM,','@@JSDH,','0','@@YWY,','@@Arr_Man,','@@Arr_Tel,','@@Arr_Address,','0','0','0','@@Account_Amount,','0','@@Brand_Code,',0,0,0,0,0,'@@QYZK,','@@DJLX,','@@Arr_Fax,','@@LGJY,','@@Pro_Amount,','@@Wl_Amount,','是')
row.SQL_UPDATE: begin delete from backdetails where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,' and check_num-back_num=0 update backlist set back_sts='1',Audit_Man='@@LS.XM,' where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,' end

row.SQL_UPDATE: update backlist set Arr_Date='@@Arr_Date,',Back_Num=b.back_num,Back_Amount=b.back_amount,exp_name='@@Exp_Name,',Back_Demo='@@Demo,',Ywy='@@YWY,',Arr_Man='@@Arr_Man,',Arr_Tel='@@Arr_Tel,',Arr_Address='@@Arr_Address,',jsdh='@@JSDH,',djlx='@@DJLX,',arr_fax='@@Arr_Fax,',lgjy='@@LGJY,',pro_amount='@@Pro_Amount,',wl_amount='@@Wl_Amount,',taf_sffs='@@Taf_SFFS,',zdzk='@@ZDZK,',isupdate='是' from backlist a,(select back_code,sum(back_num) back_num,sum(back_amount) back_amount from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,' group by back_code) b where a.back_code=b.back_code and a.Back_Code='@@Back_Code,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from backlist where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,' delete from backDetails where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from backdetails where Back_code = '@@Back_Code,' and product_code='@@Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO backdetails( PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,check_num) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,product_price PRODUCT_PRICE1, Product_Num Back_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*product_price AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,','@@Back_Type,',PRODUCT_COLOR,'@@Product_Num,' FROM product_list WHERE PRODUCT_CODE='@@Product_Code,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

row.SQL_DELETE: update backlist set back_sts='@@Back_Sts,' where back_code='@@Back_Code,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: update a_order_list set Out_Date='@@Out_Date,',Order_Memo='@@Demo,',Order_Num='@@Order_Num,',Order_Amount='@@Order_Amount,' where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin insert into a_order_list(order_code,order_num,order_amount,shop_code,order_man,order_date,order_sts) select '@@Order_Code,',fact_num-del_num,fact_amount-del_amount,'@@Agent_Code,','@@LS.XM,',getdate(),'0' from order_list where order_code='@@Old_Order_Code,' insert into a_order_detail(product_code,order_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,series_code,product_num,product_price,product_amount,shop_code,order_memo,price_type) select product_code,order_code,product_name,product_size,product_color,series_code,order_num,product_price,product_amount,shop_code,demo,price_type from (select a.product_code,'@@Order_Code,' order_code,a.product_name,a.product_size,a.product_color,a.series_code,a.fact_num-a.del_num order_num,b.type_sales product_price,(a.fact_num-a.del_num)*b.type_sales product_amount,'@@Agent_Code,' shop_code,a.demo,a.price_type,a.id from order_product_list a,product_list b where a.product_code=b.product_code and order_code='@@Old_Order_Code,' and a.product_code is not null union select product_code,'@@Order_Code,',product_name,product_size,product_color,series_code,fact_num-del_num,product_price,fact_amount-del_amount,'@@Agent_Code,',demo,price_type,id from order_product_list where order_code='@@Old_Order_Code,' and product_code is null) x order by x.id end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update a_order_list set Out_Date='@@Out_Date,',Order_Memo='@@Demo,',Order_Num='@@Order_Num,',Order_Amount='@@Order_Amount,' where Order_Code='@@Order_Code,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: update a_backlist set back_sts='1' where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from a_backdetails where Back_code = '@@Back_Code,' and product_code='@@Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO a_backdetails( PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,Sale_Price,'@@Product_Num,' Back_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*Sale_Price AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,','@@Back_Type,',PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type FROM A_stock WHERE PRODUCT_CODE='@@Product_Code,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: update a_backDetails set back_num='@@d_Order_Num,',back_amount='@@d_Order_Amount,',back_reason='@@d_Product_Memo,' where id='@@d_Product_Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from a_backdetails where Back_code = '@@Back_Code,' and product_code='@@Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO a_backdetails( PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,check_num) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,Sale_Price PRODUCT_PRICE1,case '@@Back_Type,' when '1' then Product_Num else Bad_Num end Back_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*Sale_Price AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,','@@Back_Type,',PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,'@@Product_Num,' FROM a_stock WHERE PRODUCT_CODE='@@Product_Code,' and agent_code='@@LS.DWDM,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: begin insert into backdetails(product_code,product_name,product_size,series_code,product_untl,product_price,back_num,back_amount,ticket_num,reved_num,reven_num,back_code,back_type,product_color) select product_code,product_name,product_size,series_code,product_untl,product_price,0 back_num,0 back_amount,ticket_num,isnull(reved_num,0),ticket_num-isnull(reved_num,0) reven_num, back_code,back_type,product_color from (select product_code,product_name,product_size,series_code,product_untl,product_price,back_num ticket_num,(select isnull(sum(m.back_num),0) from backdetails m,backlist n where m.back_code=n.back_code and n.jsdh=a.back_code and product_code=a.product_code and note_type='FL') reved_num,'@@Back_Code,' back_code,back_type,product_color,back_code po_code from backdetails a where back_code='@@PO_Code,' ) x where ticket_num-reved_num>0 update backlist set jsdh='@@PO_Code,' where back_code='@@Back_Code,' end
row.SQL_DELETE: if not exists (select * from backlist where back_code='@@Back_Code,') insert into backlist(Back_Code,Agent_Code,Back_Num,Back_Amount,Back_Date,Arr_Date,Back_Sts,Back_Demo,Note_Type,Opr_Man,Opr_Dw,jsdh,sfsf,arr_address,ywy,tis_amount) values('@@Back_Code,','@@Agent_Code,','@@Order_Num,','@@Order_Amount,',getdate(),'@@Arr_Date,','0','@@Demo,','@@Note_Type,','@@LS.YHDM,','@@LS.DWDM,','@@JSDH,','@@BZ,','@@Arr_Address,','@@YWY,','@@Order_Amount,') else update backlist set Arr_Date='@@Arr_Date,',Back_Num='@@Order_Num,',Back_Amount='@@Order_Amount,',Back_Demo='@@Demo,',Ywy='@@YWY,',jsdh='@@JSDH,',sfsf='@@BZ,',arr_address='@@Arr_Address,' where Back_Code='@@Back_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from order_bom where Back_code = '@@Back_Code,' and product_code='@@d_Product_Code,' ) INSERT INTO Order_Bom( Product_Code, Metail_Code, Metail_Num, Metail_Price, Metail_Amount, Bom_Memo, Back_Code) select Product_Code, Metail_Code, '@@d_Order_Num,'*Metail_Num Metail_Num, Metail_Price, '@@d_Order_Num,'*Metail_Num*Metail_Price, Bom_Memo, '@@Back_Code,' Back_Code from Metails_Bom where Product_Code='@@d_Product_Code,' else update order_bom set metail_num='@@d_Order_Num,'*b.Metail_Num,metail_price=b.Metail_Price,Metail_Amount= '@@d_Order_Num,'*b.Metail_Num*b.Metail_Price from order_bom a,Metails_Bom b where a.metail_code=b.metail_code and a.product_code=b.product_code and a.product_code='@@d_Product_Code,' and a.back_code='@@Back_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: INSERT INTO backdetails(PRODUCT_CODE, Back_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_UNTL, PRODUCT_PRICE, Back_NUM,Back_AMOUNT,Opr_Man,Back_TYPE,PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,disaccount_price,product_id,zk,back_reason,ware_code,fact_num,fact_amount,pxh,pack_num,type_agent,type_ls,product_mj,store_num) SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,'@@Back_Code, ',PRODUCT_NAME,SERIES_CODE, PRODUCT_SIZE,PRODUCT_Untl,convert(decimal(12,2),(dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@JGLX,','@@Agent_Code,',id)*dbo.getOrderZK('@@QYZK,',series_code))/100) PRODUCT_PRICE1,'@@Product_Num,' Back_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@JGLX,','@@Agent_Code,',id) AMOUNT,'@@LS.YHDM,','@@Back_Type,',PRODUCT_COLOR,Price_Type,dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@JGLX,','@@Agent_Code,',id) Product_Price,id,dbo.getOrderZK('@@QYZK,',series_code),'@@MEMO,','@@BFDH,','@@Product_Num,' Fact_NUM,'@@Product_Num,'*dbo.getOrderPrice1('@@JGLX,','@@Agent_Code,',id) Fact_AMOUNT,(select case '@@d_PXH,' when '' then isnull(max(pxh)+10,0) else @@d_PXH,-1 end from backdetails where back_code='@@Back_Code,') pxh,pack_num,type_agent,product_price,product_mj,0 FROM product_list WHERE id='@@Product_Code,'

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from verify_adh_list where agent_tel='@@lxfs,') begin insert into verify_adh_list (AGENT_tel,Brand_Code,contact_man,agent_code,agent_name,join_date,end_date) values('@@lxfs,','@@brand_name,','@@contact_man,','@@dept,','@@agent_name,',getdate(),dateadd(month,1, GETDATE()) ) end

if not exists(select * from verify_adh_list where agent_tel='@@lxfs,') insert into verify_adh_list (AGENT_tel,CONTACT_MAN,End_Date,Brand_Code,Join_Date,device_token,AGENT_TYPE,AGENT_CODE,agent_name) values('@@lxfs,','@@yhxm,',DATEADD(month,@@yxq,,getdate()),'@@brand_name,',GETDATE(),'@@device_token,','@@yhjb,','@@agent_code,','@@agent_name,') else update verify_adh_list set end_date=DATEADD(month,@@yxq,,isnull(end_date,getdate())),join_date=getdate(),device_token='@@device_token,' where agent_tel='@@lxfs,'

if not exists(select * from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@lxfs,') insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,qx_cd,qx_ck,qx_dj,qx_qt,qx_ts,bm,lxfs,dz,dzjc,yhjb,wx_headimage,wx_nick,wx_openid,wx_code) select '@@YHH,','终端店面','@@yhxm,','@@DEPT,','@@jypp,' warecode,'@@PASSWORD1,' mm,'@@STS,','2017-12-30' yxq,qx_cd,'''@@DEPT,''' qx_ck,qx_dj,'''@@jypp,''' qx_qt,'' qx_ts,'@@ZW,','@@lxfs,','@@DZ,','@@DZJC,','@@YHJB,','@@wx_headimage,','@@wx_nick,','@@wx_openid,','@@wx_code,' from bm_qxz where bm='8888' else update tj_sys_yh set yhxm='@@yhxm,',sts='@@STS,',lxfs='@@lxfs,',DZ='@@DZ,',DZJC='@@DZJC,',yhjb='@@YHJB,' where yhh='@@YHH,'

row.SQL_UPDATE: update BM_VER set VerName='@@d_VerName,',VerCode='@@d_VerCode,',OSType='@@d_OSType,',VerURL='@@d_VerURL,',VerContent='@@d_VerContent,',flag='@@d_flag,' where id='@@d_Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: begin if not exists (select * from ordersrv where order_code='@@Srv_Id,')insert into ordersrv(order_code,srv_date,srv_man,srv_mantel,srv_memo,srv_result,srv_sts,srv_yjdate,srv_yjtime) select '@@Srv_Id,','@@Srv_Date,',yhxm,lxfs,'@@Srv_Memo,','@@Srv_Result,','1','@@Srv_YjDate,','@@Srv_YjTime,' from tj_sys_yh where lxfs='@@Srv_Man,' else update ordersrv set srv_mantel='@@Srv_Man,',srv_yjdate='@@Srv_YjDate,',srv_yjtime='@@Srv_YjTime,' where order_code='@@Srv_Id,' end
row.SQL_UPDATE: update ordersrv set srv_amount='@@Srv_Amount,',srv_result='@@Srv_Result,',srv_sts='2',srv_sjdate='@@Srv_SjDate,' where order_code='@@Srv_Id,'

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo) select '@@KEY,','@@Order_Code,','@@Arr_Man,','@@Arr_Tel,',yhxm,lxfs,GETDATE(),'@@Srv_Memo,','报修' from tj_sys_yh where yhh='@@LS.YHDM,'
row.SQL_DELETE: begin delete from OrderTrack where Track_Id='@@Srv_Id,' delete from OrderParts where srv_id='@@Srv_Id,' delete from OrderSrv where Order_Code='@@Srv_Id,' end

row.SQL_INSERT: if not exists(select * from OrderTrack where Track_Id='@@ID,')insert into OrderTrack(track_id,OrderCode,CustName,Cust_Tel,Track_Man,Track_Tel,track_date,Track_Content,track_memo,wxxz,fyxs,fwxs,track_amount) select '@@ID,','@@Back_Code,','@@Arr_Man,','@@Arr_Tel,',yhxm,lxfs,GETDATE(),'@@Srv_Memo,','报修','@@wxxz,','@@fyxs,','@@fwxs,','@@S_ZJE,' from tj_sys_yh where yhh='@@LS.YHDM,' else update ordertrack set track_amount='@@S_ZJE,' where track_id='@@ID,'
row.SQL_UPDATE: insert into orderparts(product_id,product_code,product_name,product_size,product_untl,product_price,product_num,product_amount,type_sales,discount,order_code,cost_price,product_mj,product_image,srv_id) values('@@product_id,','@@product_code,','@@product_name,','@@product_size,','@@product_untl,','@@product_price,','@@product_num,','@@product_amount,','@@type_sales,','@@discount,','@@order_code,','@@cost_price,','@@product_mj,','@@product_image,','@@srv_id,')

row.SQL_INSERT: insert into tj_sys_yh (yhh,yhz,yhxm,dept,warecode,mm,sts,yxq,bm,lxfs,yhjb,bz,dzjc,qx_mob_dp,qx_mob_sj) select upper('@@agent_code,')+(select dbo.lpad('0',3,isnull(max(right(yhh,3))+1,1)) from TJ_SYS_YH where DEPT='@@agent_code,') yhh,'终端店面', '@@yhxm,','@@agent_code,', brand_code, '@@PASSWORD,','0','2038-12-30' yxq,'8889','@@lxfs,','@@yhjb,','','','''@@agent_code,''','''@@lxfs,''' from agent_list where agent_code= '@@agent_code,' update tj_sys_yh set qx_mob_sj=qx_mob_sj+',''@@lxfs,''' where qx_mob_dp like '%@@agent_code,%' and yhjb in ('老板','财务')
row.SQL_DELETE: update tj_sys_yh set mm='25ed1bcb423b0b7200f485fc5ff71c8e' where yhh='@@yhh,'
